short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Type and copy Tamil letters in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can type in Tamil language by clicking the tamil letters.
You can access additional tamil letters by clicking "More".
